code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     // Creates the render template request     SearchTemplateRequest renderRequest.     try (XContentParser parser = request.contentOrSourceParamParser()) {         renderRequest = SearchTemplateRequest.fromXContent(parser).     }     renderRequest.setSimulate(true).     String id = request.param("id").     if (id != null) {         renderRequest.setScriptType(ScriptType.STORED).         renderRequest.setScript(id).     }     return channel -> client.execute(SearchTemplateAction.INSTANCE, renderRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
